inclusion.criterion: failure of more than two first-line AEDs to control seizures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: average seizure frequency of more than one per month for 18 months and no more than three consecutive seizure-free months during that interval
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He was recently tapered off Dilantin and had no further events during the hospital course.
